sentences.en: "This ain't no affair of yours, boy!" McClosky said threateningly.
sentences.cn: “小子，这不关你的事！”麦克洛斯基威胁道。

sentences.en: An 8-year-old boy was killed by a stray bullet.
sentences.cn: 一名8岁男孩儿被流弹打死。

sentences.en: As a boy he was a Manchester United fan.
sentences.cn: 小时候，他是曼联队的球迷。

sentences.en: At their approach the little boy scurried away and hid.
sentences.cn: 他们走近时，小男孩急忙跑开藏了起来。

sentences.en: Benedict had been a wild boy and a quarrelsome young man.
sentences.cn: 贝内迪克特小时候野性难驯，年轻时又爱与人争吵。

sentences.en: boys and girls aged 11–18
sentences.cn: 11到18岁之间的男孩和女孩

sentences.en: Come on, Timmy, act like a big boy (=  an older boy  ) now.
sentences.cn: 行了，蒂米，要有大男孩的样子了。

sentences.en: Good boy!
sentences.cn: 好伙计！

sentences.en: He quit his job as an office boy in Athens.
sentences.cn: 他辞去了在雅典当办公室勤杂工的工作。

sentences.en: He touched the boy's forehead. It was burning hot.
sentences.cn: 他摸了摸男孩的额头,烧得烫手.

sentences.en: I could see the young boy struggling to free himself.
sentences.cn: 我看到小男孩正在奋力挣脱。

sentences.en: In the end, it was an easy delivery: a fine baby boy.
sentences.cn: 分娩过程最终非常顺利，生了个健康的男婴。

sentences.en: Oh Boy! Just think what I could tell him.
sentences.cn: 哇，好家伙！想想看我会告诉他什么。

sentences.en: Some people accuse the tax inspectors of bully-boy tactics.
sentences.cn: 有些人指控税务稽查员使用了流氓手段。

sentences.en: The boy first showed promise as an athlete in grade school.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩在上小学的时候就初次显示出成为运动员的潜力。

sentences.en: The boy's room is a complete contrast to the guest room.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩的房间和客房截然不同。

sentences.en: The boys wanted to play football.
sentences.cn: 男孩子们想踢足球。

sentences.en: The little boy stepped forward timidly and shook Leo's hand.
sentences.cn: 小男孩羞怯地走上前去握了握利奥的手。

sentences.en: There was a deep frown on the boy's face.
sentences.cn: 男孩眉头紧锁.

sentences.en: What a polite little boy (=  young male child  ) you are.
sentences.cn: 你真是个有礼貌的小男孩。

words.tran_cn: 男孩的；孩子气的；（女孩）像男孩的

phrases.tran_cn: 铁臂阿童木（日本的漫画机器人）
n. （给打网球的人捡球的）球童
n. 童子军；过于理想而不切实际者；单纯的政治家
孩子总是孩子嘛！（意为男孩子难免要淘气，不足为怪）
掌上游戏机；热衷于电子游戏的男孩
切开中间夹肉干酪蔬菜等的大三明治
漂亮男孩；脂粉气十足的男人；矫揉造作的男子

trans.tran_cn: 好家伙（表示激动、羡慕等情感）

trans.tran_en: a male child, or a male person in general

trans.tran_cn: 男孩, 儿子, 孩子气的人, 男仆
trans.tran_en: a male child, or a male person in general
